The clarity of the front cam (no rear cam) is actually better than the iPad's cameras. Haven't watched any videos yet. So far the functions I've used are good. I am satisfied for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Breezer815
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. The size and weight are great. Not too big, but have a good screen resolution for watching videos/playing games. Sounds is great. Easy to get around. The only downfall is that sometimes it has a lag time with swyping and scrolling even after having it only a month or so. Overall, though, well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Faster more Flawless Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kristen E. Bogren "Kristen Bogren"
Reviews.Content: I love my new HDX Display Kindle- I wavered back and forth actually needing a new one as my HD Kindle I bought last year worked great but I loved the new Operating System, and everything seems to work better, and more smooth. The sound is awesome, way better then my first HD Kindle- Sound is stereo like, and perfect for me. Battery life is better, just a all around better product.I gave my mom my older Kindle fire and we Skype on in, the video chat still works awesome. I am very happy with my decision to buy the upgraded kindle- It moves faster, things run more flawlessly- Happy with my decision !

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: SP "Slim"
Reviews.Content: This is the best gadget that I have ever purchased. The screen is so clear and the sound is awesome. I love it. I bought my wife the 8.9 HDX and the video 1080p is nuts. We have a baby girl and the 64 gig is alot of storage for memories! Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: I'm so addicted.
Reviews.Author: Katrina K. Oberhelman "Katrina"
Reviews.Content: I really wasn't sure how much I would use this, but I'm loving it. I've had it for two days and have already spent hours on it. I love the little games. Great for passing the time when I'm bored. I've even started reading a book on it and I haven't read a book in months. I go in and out of interests, but this is easier to hold for me than a book. I have arthritis and it gets tiring to hold books. This is nice and light and easy to hold or lay down when I'm tired and still have something to play with. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Love love LOVE my new Kindle Fire!!!
Reviews.Author: Jenny A
Reviews.Content: I loved my old one, and this one is worlds better!!  The colors are so crisp and clear, the browser so fast, and the sound!!  I never listened to music on my old one, it was like listening thru a tin can.  The new Kindle has great sound!!  I also love the improved battery life.  My old Kindle is almost two years old, still works fine, so I really debated if I needed a new one--I am SO happy I decided to get this.Also, just a word about Amazons service--I buy mostly online, and I have never found another company to compare to Amazon.  I know there was a problem with UPS over this holiday week--they were backed up, but this was no fault of Amazons.  The problem is that NO ONE wants to deal with the post office any more, so it seems everyone went with UPS or FedEx this holiday.  Amazon is the ONLY company I trust completely, I know I will get what I ordered, get it fast, and if I have to return anything it will be taken care of promptly and with no drama.  I am an Amazon customer for life.  THANKS, Amazon, for being the worlds BEST retailer!

Reviews.Title: excellent!
Reviews.Author: Mary C. Mcgrath "her-is-murr"
Reviews.Content: was purchased for my son who is in the military and must live out of a duffel bag.  this was small, lightweight and hands down the best gift for him.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: H. C. Keith
Reviews.Content: I already have an iPad, which I love, but my husband is always using it.  I love to read too, so I thought for awhile about the Kindle.  Bought it for myself for Christmas, and am so glad I did!!!  Clear, sharp display, quick response, and i love to tap into my Amazon Prime account to borrow books for FREE!  I can prop this up on my recumbant bike and read or watch a show while getting my exercise (benefit - I exercise longer!).  Small enough to easily drop into my purse.  I think this may become a normal part of me like my phone!

Reviews.Title: Amazing product, just right for me
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I was pleasurably surprised when Amazon emailed me their offer of a free 30 day trial of the new Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 7”. To tell the truth, I have been meaning to buy a similar reading device with tablet capabilities and couldn’t figure out whether to buy the Nook HD, the Kindle Fire HDX or the Sony Experia Z Ultra. Of course it’s a matter of money. I am not made of the green stuff and even a $300 expense is big enough for me to think three times before buying something first in order to try it out. I read all the reviews, all the personal experiences put out by people, but still, it isn’t the same as having the thing at home to play around with.This way works the best – they sent the 32GB version that I had chosen in less than 3 days.From the moment I got the package in my hands, I was in love. It is simply great – it does (almost) everything an IPAD does at a fraction of the cost.First, the cons – as I am sure there’s ample information on the pros.1. The camera is ONLY on the front – there is no camera behind the screen. Makes skyping and taking pictures just a tad harder. Not a dealbreaker though, given all the other great stuff this little tablet does.2.  The page turning is by swipes only. When you are tucked in a cozy comforter on a cold night, you sometimes wish for right/left buttons – again, a minor annoyance.3. The weight – it’s a tad heavier than the Sony Experia Z Ultra. But honestly, if losing weight means spending $400 extra, I can do without it!4. The included charger is really slow – I spent the extra money for the power charger. Only I didn’t spend $19.99 on Amazon – I got it on eBay (new) from China, for $5.22, free shipping. Still waiting on it, but its guaranteed to arrive in a couple of days.  Works for me!5. I am an Amazon Prime buff – in fact Prime content is the prime reason why I chose the Kindle. It works great – only your ‘watchlist’ shows perhaps a quarter of what you have saved. If there is a way to see the entire watchlist, I haven’t discovered it (yet).6. The carousel is annoying. It pops up unbidden whenever the Kindle’s turned on. I don’t need to display exactly what books and movies I have purchased and would have preferred if there was a way to discreetly tuck them away only to be brought out when I wish.7. Browsing emails on yahoo can sometime be frustrating – scrolling is immensely difficult as the tablet, to me, seems too sensitive – whether I use a stylus or my fingers, it tends to pop open the email instead of allowing me to scroll thru the list.8. Downloading movies is not too cool – takes too long and if the Kindle powers off, there you go. Lost the portion that you had already downloaded and need to restart.That’s the lot of semi-bad news, if you can call it that. To me, it’s all stuff I can live with, nothing major. Here’s the positive stuff:1. It is GREAT to watch a movie or a show on. The picture (we have a high-speed broadband Wi-Fi) is crystal clear; there is NO dithering or wait time as the video caches. It’s like watching your own personal wrap around widescreen. You might think the size would be too small, but when you do watch it, the screen’s placed close enough to your face comfortably and it actually seems like a much larger screen. Like I said, GREAT definition and clarity.2. The sound’s amazing – clear, sharp and realistic. Even without headphones, it’s powerful enough to give true surround effect and loud enough to make my wife complain. With headphones, you don’t disturb anyone and the immersion is complete. BTW I bought JLabs Jbud J5 ear buds with this after doing some R&D; (read my review if you wish – I even bought an extra pair for the wife) and it’s a perfect match right off the top. Tailor made for the Kindle Fire HDX.3. Reading books is easy, except that a couple of left/right/page turning buttons wouldn’t have hurt. The light levels’s just right and if a white page glares at you, voila, make the screen black, the letters white! Bunch of choices in terms of fonts (publisher’s font included) and one can size them up or down as required.4. Browsing – the silk browser is really great. Fast, no nonsense stuff.5. People talk about the ‘offers’ as annoying – I find it extremely entertaining. Not just are the products good (no TV infomercials here) but also the entire ad experience is VERY unobtrusive. Flick it off whenever you wish and go back using the tab.6. Navigating the Kindle is great (except perhaps the carousel feature which I didn’t like). Downloading documents and files, pictures etc is really fast, movies, not so much as explained in ‘Cons’.7. Best part is its portability. The 7” is slightly too big to slip into the back pocket of my jeans and a jacket pocket is required. However if you do sort out the carrying issue, it’s great to have along and works everywhere there’s Wi-Fi.8. I took the Boingo Wi-Fi on the go service and so far haven’t had too much trouble with it. Of course it’s not as fast as it’s touted to be and there is a tendency to hook you to the nearest network instead of the dedicated Boingo network, but hey, whatever works. I am not that finicky. It takes a bit of time to get hooked, but once it does, it’s a strong link and stays hooked unless you move a few blocks.9. The case and paraphernalia. I definitely wouldn’t recommend spending $50-60 on the recommended sleeves and cases. I bought the Fintie faux leather package and for $20 approx, got a nice collection of stylus, sleeve, extra USB cable and some other small stuff. Works even better if you just buy the Fintie case for about $9.99. You definitely need a bigger case to stuff all those bits and pieces though – the charger, USB, stylus, headphones etc. I also bought a screen protector and a TPU Gel soft skin cover to be used in parallel with my Fintie case as added protection. It’s a tighter fit, but works perfectly.All in all, it’s a GREAT purchase and I am loving it. Will be happy to answer any specific questions that anyone has.  I, for one, am a VERY HAPPY customer.

Reviews.Title: Very responsive, great screen
Reviews.Author: Booker
Reviews.Content: This thing is so cheap that I didn't expect it to be as good as it is. The screen resolution is great, the speakers are good, the touchscreen is responsive, and it has a good selection of apps, at least for the type of stuff I do (like email, Facebook, Flipboard, Netflix, HBO). I've already used Mayday, and it works just as advertised--awesome! I don't play games, so I can't say whether it's any good for gaming.I thought about getting the iPad, and I'm really glad I didn't. It would have been a huge waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Michael Slayton
Reviews.Content: It handles well, has great features and the Mayday button is great (especially for tech-dolts such as me).  I searched on line for lots of tablets, went to stores and handled them and I'm glad I got this one.  It's going to work out just great.

Reviews.Title: I really love the new Kindle
Reviews.Author: toothwarriorprincess
Reviews.Content: I just can't believe how much clearer, sharper and brighter than the kindle fire.  Much lighter and smaller.  I just love love love it!!  Really happy I decided to purchase to purchase the HDX this year.

Reviews.Title: Best Gift for myself
Reviews.Author: Grandma Rose
Reviews.Content: I just love it and love playing games and still look things up. I wonder if I should of got a 32 Gb since Iam always on it.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: jeepstang
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet. However I returned it because I didn't see that much difference from my kindle fire. If this is the first kindle u buy then it is a nice buy.

Reviews.Title: Enjoy
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Really enjoy the ease of taking it with me wherever I go. Like reading & playing games during breaks at work & this fits in lunch bag perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Much improved
Reviews.Author: jms
Reviews.Content: Lighter and sharper than the iPad mini, it is a much better reader.  It doesn't have the same apps available, but it is very useful.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet...for inside use..
Reviews.Author: Pat Rini
Reviews.Content: Bright lovely screen and many interesting and some free apps and books..can keep me busy for quite a long time..Dont like reading my Facebook page on this device....and having a hard time getting rid of the one click ordering...I want to enter my password to order in case I lose the Kindle and someone else can ring up a big bill for me..Used the help guy once and it didn't work..may try again.....I bought one for my 10 year old grandson for Xmas and I am sure he is going to love the games and books..

Reviews.Title: I love my new kindle
Reviews.Author: O. Ben Isaac
Reviews.Content: It is such an elegant tablet! I really love it. It's very comfortable and easy to use.I only wish it had a back camera, not only front camera.

Reviews.Title: Must have
Reviews.Author: acidburn_9779
Reviews.Content: This kindle is great. Has all the things I wanted out of a tablet. Amazing graffics. Outstanding speakers. Amazing battery life. Only bad thing is how long it takes to charge back up.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is Awesome!
Reviews.Author: MidwestMama22
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my first tablet, the new Kindle Fire HDX, as are my kids! I hadn't used a tablet before so I checked out a number of models and brands in the stores, and read many reviews before deciding on this purchase. I have been using Amazon Prime for many months for the shipping; and the added benefits with the videos was a draw for me since I had no intention of spending much on content for a tablet. The picture is so clear and bright, significantly better than our tv or phones. The wifi connects quickly to our home network. Downloads are quick, though I usually order the content on my laptop and it shows up immediately. I'm sure I haven't yet used all the features but I love everything about the Kindle Fire HDX so far and I can hardly keep my kids off of it!

Reviews.Title: Good product.
Reviews.Author: j Rock
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Very happy with my purchase of the Kindle HDX. I shopped around before buying it and found it was the best out there. Great for everything you can use it for. I tried one out at Staples and at first, the video on the demo model was kinda lacking. I still bought my HDX via Amazon though. When I received it, on time btw, I was pleasantly surprised. The video quality was awesome. It was the video that they had on the demo model that was crap. Yes the new HDX models have that blue border when reading books. The solution to that is changing the background color to back with white letters. If there is one thing negative I can say about this particular model its the size. While using it to browse the web, I realized maybe the 8.9 model would be a touch better just bc it is bigger. But if you are used to using a cell phone to browse the web then its not really an issue bc u would be used to swiping around a web page. And one more thing. Why not put a second camera on this thing like the 8.9? That would make more sense. That would make the HDX 7 awesome! IMO, the only choice you have to make is which HDX to buy. Forget the other tablets. They are either too pricey for what u get or don't have enough processing power or memory.

Reviews.Title: Best deal on the market!!!!
Reviews.Author: E. Rhodes "Liz"
Reviews.Content: It does everything I need, and I can DL documents (yes, Word documents!) and view and edit them on my Kindle...with the installation of a simple and inexpensive app.  I am amazed at how powerful and robust this product is.  Compared to all of the other similar products out there, this one is the best by far for the money!

Reviews.Title: The best kindle yet
Reviews.Author: Richard Stampfle "Richard S."
Reviews.Content: When asked which book most people would take with them to the loneliest place in the world, the answer is often The Bible. For me the only book I will ever need anywhere is this Kindle Fire HDX. Like so many other Kindle users this is a device that I would not want to do without. I love it! From here in Thailand this afternoon I used the MAYDAY feature for the first time. Within minutes I was connected with the friendliest operator and tech rep I had ever talked to and before the conversation was over my small technical problem was solved.If there were a place to rate AMAZON customer service, I would give it TEN STARS. These folks are the heart of the Amazon organization. Well done Amazon on the Kindle Fire HDX and on your customer service.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Amazon Contents
Reviews.Author: T. Law
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to give this a try because of the form factor. I have had a full size iPad since it came out, I currently own the third generation with 4G service. But, every since the iPad Mini came out, I've been looking for a smaller more portable tablet to carry around. Since half of my media contents are purchased from Amazon, I thought it was time to look at the Kindle HDX, the only non-Apple tablet I would consider because of the specs and size.I was not disappointed with the size, both dimensions and weight. The tablet was easy to hold and I actually found the placement of the buttons in the back easy to get used to and use. I did notice the blue haze around the screen, but that did not both me.The reasons why I returned my unit were:1. I can only access half of the media I owned. The other half is on iTunes.2. The browser kept crashing on me and would not work on a few sites I frequent.3. The Amazon App Store is really limited in quantity and quality.Besides, if I buy an iPad Mini, I could access all my iTunes and Amazon media. So, I returned my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: What an incredible improvement in just two years' time
Reviews.Author: Colby D. May
Reviews.Content: I just received the seven-inch Amazon Kindle Fire HDX (64 GB, Wi-Fi, Includes Special Offers) today and have been using it now for about four hours. This review will evolve as I continue to use the device, but my initial impressions are...this is a fantastic device for the money.I still own a first-generation Kindle Fire whose stock OS and user experience were so bad I had to eventually root it and install stock Android Jelly Bean on it to make it usable. That Amazon has progressed from that to this in two years' time is remarkable.If you're worried about value, don't: just buy one if you think you want one (that's kind of a quote from a photography expert who has a blog and reviews a lot of gear). The value for the money here is incredible.Here are my pros and cons, which I will expand upon as I return to this review and update it periodically as I do more with the HDX.PROS:+ The screen. I've been trying to get an hour's worth of work done at the office, but I just can't take my eyes off the display. It is gorgeous, bright, sharp, accurate. Everything the pro reviewers have said about this display is true, but it doesn't prepare you for the actual first glimpse. It's an awesome panel.+ The sound. I fired up "Smokey and the Bandit" and was perplexed by the quality and volume of sound coming from the seemingly tiny speakers on the back of the device. Despite their location, it seems like the sound is coming right out of the screen. The engineers knocked a homerun here. Unless you're practicing privacy, headphones or external speakers are not essential.+ The design. The tapered edges give the device an ultra-slim appearance when viewed from most angles from the front side of the device, yet the body has sufficient thickness to be gripped and held easily. When the screen is off, it is very difficult to see the screen's location within the bezel...like a solid sheet of black. It is well-built, but it is light. And it's balanced well--I'm using an old Incipio stand originally designed for a Galaxy Nexus phone with the HDX, and it's perfectly stable and solid.+ Ease of use and setup. Within five minutes of unboxing, the device was ready for use, and that included downloading an OS update, setting up two email accounts, a Facebook account and a Twitter account. Amazon's ability to pre-register the device prior to shipping is huge.CONS- Blue screen edges. Most of the time they're not distracting, and I understand that they're "necessary" given the fact Amazon chose to use blue LED's to illuminate the screen and ensure close-to-100% color accuracy. But when browsing webpages or reading books, at my present stage of HDX enjoyment, they are a bit of a distraction. I'm hoping I get used to them. (10:56 AM, 12/23/13)- Amazon's app ecosystem. This is not a knock on the device but rather an indictment of Amazon's app store. But my hunch is that with the HDX devices developers will get cracking on making the freshest versions of apps available for Kindle Fire devices sooner and in greater quantity. Specifically, Spotify is ages old compared to the current versions available for iOS and Android, and more seriously crippling is the fact that the version Amazon offers does not support Spotify's new free-listening initiatives for mobile devices and tablets. Let's hope this improves soon.More to come...but again, this device at the price Amazon is asking is simply a no-brainer. Just buy it and enjoy it!

Reviews.Title: HDX for Sure!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I really love the super sharp high definition on the new Fire HDX.  Although I originally considered purchasing it as a book and magazine reader, I am stunned by the quality of the video!  The picture is even sharper than my 1080P HDTV.  I have started using it to watch television programs and movies, more than for anything else. Great job Kindle!

Reviews.Title: A very nice pseudo computer tablet.
Reviews.Author: C. Leese
Reviews.Content: This is my first Tablet and I purchased this because of the 4 payment plan offered by Amazon.  I am still learning my way around and will update this review later with more information.  The display is amazingly clear HD and watching movies is a snap, as long as you use Amazon!  I haven't tried Netflix yet, but so far the Amazon selection seems to be fine.  The only peeve I have is that there is no manual included to help the purchaser with mundane things like transferring calendars and address books.

Reviews.Title: simply amazing
Reviews.Author: Tracy Dorey
Reviews.Content: I just got mine delivered today around noon and haven't put it down since. Yo everyone who is saying that they aren't getting what they were expecting then they were obviously expecting the impossible or an iPad. This is not an iPad, the is an e-reader/tablet. No the selection of games isn't as dense as on an iPad or android devise but the media selection is phenomenal. I've done everything on this devise from reading books/magazines to playing games and surfing the web to downloading music and videos. The speed of this quad-core processor is unreal, faster than my core i3 laptop. This thing is absolutely wonderful and am completely satisfied with my purchase. I would honestly pay upwards of 300 for a device of this nature. Money well spent and would recommend to anyone looking for an awesome tablet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Darline Mason
Reviews.Content: An old grandma learning new technology! I am learning to use this product and really am enjoying it. It has been nice to have so many items on one product to use whenever I want. Highly recommend. A++

Reviews.Title: All I ever needed and more
Reviews.Author: Sahar
Reviews.Content: I was considering the mini iPad but since I was just looking for a media device, chose the Kindle Fire.  I got it and immediately was impressed with the display.  WOW!  I brought it into work and a colleague brought her first generation mini iPad.  There was no comparison.  I can't speak for the new Retina mini iPad but I've been told the Kindle Fire HDX still looks better.The top reasons for purchasing the Kindle HDX was to read books, get news, send email, text from Google account (which it does), watch short movies (90 minutes or less by streaming or from my Cloud), and listen to my music (all in Cloud).In addition, I've turned my Kindle Fire HDX into my alarm clock/sleep timer to ocean waves, my event calender, sole source for Skyping, and main internet searching device. (I don't play games)I have a Macbook but since I've bought the Kindle HDX, I really haven't used my Mac much.I did buy the 16GB and that gave me just under 11 GB when I got it.  After downloading the apps I needed and a song, I still have close to 10 GB.  I basically use the Cloud for everything.I really don't have anything to complain about.  It is doing everything I need.

Reviews.Title: I love the new features, it makes my library much more user friendly.
Reviews.Author: Bellesmom "bellesmom"
Reviews.Content: I have not had it for very long but so far I am happy with it.  It is a bit harder to navigate than my KF 1st gen 7" but some of the new features are really nice.  My favorite so far is the way I can tap on the books in my library & it gives me the info on the book as if I picked up a paperback & read the back times 10 , meaning you get all the info pertaining to that particular book.  That is a really great help when you are selecting your new book , especially when it has been a while since you purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Amazon takes gamble but everyone wins!
Reviews.Author: Cdawg & Co.
Reviews.Content: Incredible product. Chose this over other similar tablets based on good reviews, screen resolution, price and reliability of the android operating system. Side by side comparison of this versus previous HD model showed the vast improvement in picture quality and resolution. Price is unbeatable for what device offers. Amazon literally sells these for less than their production costs. They take a loss on each one sold! That's a company and product willing to take a risk for the benefit of the customer and the hope they will use this great device to buy other products.Highly recommended

Reviews.Title: My first kindle and I love it
Reviews.Author: Todd Aldrich
Reviews.Content: I was looking at many different tablet options.  I decided on the kindle fire hdx 7".  I couldn't be more happy with it.  It does exactly what I need it to do.  For the cost compared to other tablets and the quality I believe this is the best choice for a handheld tablet.  The negative reviews I saw about a bluish hue along the edges are extremely dramatized.  While I have noticed the bluish hue around the display it is not very noticeable even when reading against a white background.  Unless I was actually looking for it I didn't even notice it was there.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: james barksdale
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. I would give the product 5 stars if it wasn't for the "Special offers". The special offers are advertisements that are displayed on the Kindle after power up or sleep mode. You either pay not to get the special offers or pay to remove them later. It cost $15 to remove...

Reviews.Title: great tablet, just needs some apps
Reviews.Author: justin
Reviews.Content: Overall the tablet is very functional, aesthetically pleasing, long-lasting in the power department, and provides amazing resolution.  Everything about this tablet is great and for the best price on the market when considering top name tablets.  Two negatives drop this down to a four star.  The ports being at an angle cause problems when using more protective cases.  App selection is dismal.  This is ranked as a top student tablet and I can't get blackboard without using the actual website.  Missing many big name apps and all the hidden gems.  This must change.

Reviews.Title: What's not to love?
Reviews.Author: I. Fagin "Lewyland"
Reviews.Content: Yes, I'm in love with my new kindle fire. A bit of a learning curve cause I'm usually an apple person. But the mayday feature is great.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Kidwell
Reviews.Content: Gave it as a gift. Was perfect. I was also very pleased that I received this in just 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Geek
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: Yeah, totally geeked out on this one.I bought this for an upcoming trip. I have an e-reader and a laptop. I try to avoid travelling internationally with my laptop. So far I really like this. Only downside, not a whole lot of Google apps (gmail and G+). I realize Google has their own tablet, but still, these basic apps should be available.Very user friendly - I would dare say my grandmother could probably use this.

Reviews.Title: Killer Deal - Great Performance - No Memory Expansion Though.
Reviews.Author: Webmaestro
Reviews.Content: Killer deal, great performance and screen. I didn't realize that there is no way to get more memory via a card slot or something before I bought it. Evidently 16GB won't hold a hi-def movie so I'll have to use a streaming service or download 720P content instead. It is easy to move stuff between the computer and Kindle via USB however. It's a huge improvement over my 1st Gen. Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Love my HDX
Reviews.Author: Mary E Pavlina
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it!!  Light weight.  Picture's great.  64gig.  What better?  I even learned how to work the origami case!

Reviews.Title: Great alternative to an iPad
Reviews.Author: Andy Schumacher
Reviews.Content: Touch sensitivity is a little lacking compared to an iPad.  Great device overall for the price.  Would definitely recommend if price conscious compared to an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX - WOW!
Reviews.Author: Joe Tee
Reviews.Content: This is brand-new to me - supposed to be a Christmas gift, but I've been getting acquainted with it a little early.  Very fast despite its small size and so much it can do - I'm just learning.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, Useful Technology
Reviews.Author: S. M. Panella
Reviews.Content: I was not sure how to rate this product, on just technological amazement, for me it is a 5 star, but then I have not had a touch screen anything until now. I am a relative Luddite compared to most reviewers. So, the utility to me for listening to music, reading articles and books, and getting information from the internet it is excellent. The review lacking that one more star is because the device is somewhat a standalone device with respect to my TV, stereo, and laptop. There is no communication without hooking up a cable. I'm sure I could get copious guidance that if I downloaded some app or service or buy another communication device then I'd be set, but then that is not just the Kindle that I'd be reviewing. So, still, the Kindle is a wonderful purchase and could have been featured by Walter Cronkite as a wonder of the 21st century in that futurist program from the 60's I used to watch as a kid.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: W. Adams "book girl"
Reviews.Content: Much better than my original kindle fire. I don't even use my Ipad anymore. Worth it for the mayday feature alone.

Reviews.Title: I highly recommend this product.
Reviews.Author: Lynn Morse
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle HDX.I wish I had gotten the 4GE added on,but it is perfect to carry with me,instead of my laptop, since youconnect to wireless just aboutanywhere.

Reviews.Title: Amazon scores a touchdown with this one!
Reviews.Author: Carol Joy Hartley
Reviews.Content: Wow I'm so impressed with this device.  I also have an ipad 2 and a ipad mini.  The display on this device is gorgeous and very user friendly.  As soon as I turned it on it was ready to go.  I watched a couple of episodes of Alpha House and it was the easiest thing in the world to go to videos and select.  It was instantly there for me to watch and enjoy.  The sound was fantastic and I only had the volume at 1/2 which was plenty loud.  I decided to go with the 30 day free trial of amazon prime and I'll be keeping that since I love the instant streaming and selection.  I also have a paperwhite kindle and was reading a book (Sycamore Row) and went and checked it out on the kindle fire and it was perfectly synced with no problems and no effort on my part.  I also loaded Words with Friends which I was playing on my mini ipad and that synced up with ease.  I couldn't resist the mayday button and I had a question which was responded to and answered by a very pleasant gal quickly.  That's enough to make me love it more since I hate voice mail and pushing a zillion buttons to get to customer service.  I've downloaded some music and everything I already had loaded in the cloud was available for me to snatch and use.  I'm so happy with my purchase and think it's worth every penny I spent on it.  I did get the 16gb with the ads (which don't bother me at all).  This is the first amazon device I've purchased that I've not opted out and paid not to have ads.  The camera isn't an issue since I don't plan on using this for taking pictures since I have other devices to do that with.  Even if you have an ipad this is a great device to have.  Much easier at least for me to incorporate videos and the sound is so much better without having to use head phones.I'm happy, happy.... beautiful color, fabulous for watching video & fantastic audio sound.  Love my Kindle fire hdx & the origami case I purchased to go with it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect tablet, I love it
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I love it, and I highly recommend it. I love the fact that it ill read your kindle books for you so you can just relax and listen. God bless.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product I would buy another on later on.
Reviews.Author: amy
Reviews.Content: I love having this Kendal hd I love how you can talk to a person when you have a problem and they can walk your problem. My husband loves it also I get to use while he is at work and he plays games all night. I love the kindle I like it better than my own computer.

Reviews.Title: Really good help from the service people
Reviews.Author: cherishak
Reviews.Content: This is a great product but it still has its glitches. The first two weeks were great then the download queue started acting up. They fixed it but now my kindle will turn on the talk button every once in awhile and it tells you everything you touch. It is easy to turn off though. I can't tell you enough about the help team they are fast and you have a button to help you walk through any problems that you have. I connected with a tech that could see my screen and he walked me through everything. I would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx
Reviews.Author: lexie Sherwood
Reviews.Content: loving the kindle fire hdx, the only reason why i didnt 5 star is theres no way to customize the "wallpaper".

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: babygirldmc
Reviews.Content: Loving my new Kindle Fire right now. Loved the 1st generation Fire as well but this one is faster and the screen is clearer due to the HD. I like the fact that I can print to my wireless printer and the keyboard has the letter trace capability. Also I pulled the pics off my phone thru cloud so I could see them on here. The only thing so far that I don't like is that there is no way (or I haven't figured out how) to select multiple emails so I can delete them unlike my other Kindle Fire. Besides that....Awesome!

Reviews.Title: A winner, as they planned...well
Reviews.Author: ROB SMURAWA
Reviews.Content: Fantastic!  Affordable for such advanced technology.  Speed, weight, resolution, battery life all major pluses.  Think Apple needs a new horse to win this race.  My opinion...

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle ever!
Reviews.Author: h. Richard  greatest game ever.v
Reviews.Content: This is the best Kindle yet!  Greta memory, fast connections, and all-around great choice in a tablet.  I'm glad I chose it!  The only drawback is that the "slide" open button occassionally sticks" and I have trouble opening the device  - Other than that, it's still my favorite!

Reviews.Title: great tablet, excellent customer service to help with battery issues
Reviews.Author: L. Meeks
Reviews.Content: Great upgrade to kindle fire.  I had some battery issues with the one I bought so I went to amazon customer service.  They replaced the kindle two times and gave me a return label at no charge for the bad ones.  Great tablet, great customer service!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Molly Rigg
Reviews.Content: I have had my kindle fire hex 7" for a month now and absolutely love it.  The sound and picture is wonderful.  The special offers are pretty cool that you can get.  My kindle is very easy to use. Overall this is an awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Is Much Better Than Kindle Fire, which Was Already Great!
Reviews.Author: bcb
Reviews.Content: Kindle has done it again.  The Kindle Fire HDX is much better than the Kindle Fire and makes me wonder how I ever got along with just the plain old first Kindle, which I loved at the time.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Pepple "duzy suzy"
Reviews.Content: I have nooks and also the kindle paper white - but this e reader is the best yet!  it does it all and has beautiful picture.  I would highly recommend - You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Indispensible.  I Take It Everywhere.
Reviews.Author: Linda J Partridge
Reviews.Content: I love it!  It slips into my purse and I have everything I need for whatever the day brings.  In Notes, I have to do lists, reminders, and shopping lists.  In calendar I have appointments, times, places, and reminder function if I need it.  If I have to wait somewhere -- well, I can sit back just continue my book or game.  I know I haven't even begun to explore all the entertainment options and functions yet, either.  The size is perfect -- small and light enough to carry easily, and big enough to enjoy reading and games.  I loved my Kindle Fire, but this is much better.

Reviews.Title: My personal comments
Reviews.Author: Kristine Majka
Reviews.Content: beautiful color display. Has everything  an adult and child could want in the palm of your hand. Love the 24/7 help. Used that and was in awe. Fast response and people as helpful and knowledgeable as can be.

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Denise P.St.John
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle !Great from the get-goExcellent pic. I'm also happy with the stereo sound. I have Pandora and the music actually sounds good through it and I can even listen to it across the room.Graphics are excellent.I also have to say that I like the Mayday a lot.I've only used it a couple times, but when you've got a question or are stuck, you're gonna love having it.They even helped us with an issue with our first edition Kindle Fire.Gotta love that!

Reviews.Title: NO HDMI out on KFHDX-- AMAZON Prime log in password.
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: I just ordered a Kindle Fire HDX, and it is shipping now.Now I read that this model does not have the HDMI out.I really looked forward to connecting it to my large screen Phillips TV.We do have a PS3 and PS4 so I guess this won't be too much of a problem.Does Amazon have a way to "log in" on your PS3,  withOUTusing your email and Amazon password-the same ones that have your credit card info etc....DeeUP-DATE:You can make a PIN# on your PS3/PS4 -so it can stream Prime video -BUT NO shopping without the PIN.I still wish they had kept the mini HDMI out-Use this link to see a list and register your second screen devices:http://www.amazon.com/help/secondscreen-kindlefire11-30-2013I also added another STAR- I really like the Kindle.Started reading a Kindle book last night, which I loved.We also watched a Prime video stream which looked GREAT.Dee

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Vicki
Reviews.Content: Super cool tablet, love the reading view on the internet. CONS: not flash compatible or Firefox ready. :( Other than that, lightening fast processor, speakers have a nice sound and touch screen seems resistant to finger prints.

Reviews.Title: don't like the angled charging port
Reviews.Author: C. Wescott
Reviews.Content: Love it so far. My only issues are the angled direction you have to plug in the charger and the on/off switch. I bought this fire because the port failed in my 1st generation fire. Everyone said the fix was more than half the price of the $139 new Fire.  I upgraded to the HDX because I use my Fire a lot. This angled plug seems ackward and I'm worried it will fail quicker than my old one.

Reviews.Title: Does it all..
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Love it. Does everything we need and super easy to use. If your interested in buying a tablet give it a try

Reviews.Title: won't play all videos
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle except that  I try to play videos that come up and say this plug-in not supported. Whats with that?  My KindleFie first edition plays them.  I thought this would play them also.  But otherwise so far so good..

Reviews.Title: A fantastic little tablet!
Reviews.Author: G or K B
Reviews.Content: A great little tablet!  Screen resolution is wonderful.  All the features gives one almost everything a laptop or desktop does.  There are hundreds if not thousands of free apps to choose from, and the ones you pay for are plentiful as well.  Contrary to what I had read in other reviews, setting mine up to my Wi-fi system was smooth and easy.  However, as with the original Kindle, keeping the tablet in a cover during use could interfere with smooth operation.  Battery life is not real long if you are on a game but if just reading, it is adequate to give you plenty of time between chargings.  A screen protector or use of stylus is recommended unless you want to be cleaning the surface often.  The Mayday button is priceless!  A real person to help you with questions or in my case setting up additional email.  This alone sets this tablet apart from any out there that I have seen.  So glad I got this!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HDx
Reviews.Author: Evegue
Reviews.Content: I love this item I love all the apps the size and the weight and it's a very affordable tablet !

Reviews.Title: The BEST KINDLE YET!!!
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE FIRE HDX. It works great and the help from a live person that you can see is astounding. I have used the HELP line a dozen times and they are there within 15 seconds everytime.They will solve your problem for you or help you learn how. This ONE function alone makes this Kindle worth it, but its impressive in many other ways that I could share with you, but am too busy playing with it to talk to you about them!!!

Reviews.Title: love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I had a nook before, and the kindle fire HDX is infinitely better! The biggest difference I find to be most important is the fact that soooo many more apps are available with the kindle than there were with the nook.  Well done Amazon!

Reviews.Title: The Kindle Fire HDX Rocks !
Reviews.Author: Rando 1
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX has everything that I wanted in a small tablet . It's fast , the display is stunning and with my prime membership , I not only get free shipping on purchases , but access to thousands of free apps , games , videos , books and a whole lot more . I am very happy with this purchase and at least two of my friends are getting one now . Great job Amazon !

Reviews.Title: I'm very impressed!
Reviews.Author: Donald Manguso "Retired Guy"
Reviews.Content: MY Fire HDX is absolutely amazing and the May day is complete game changer. All of my friends and family are blown away by the display first off and just continue to be more impressed as they get further into it's features. Everybody is impressed by the sound of the music and the quality of the colors in the display. I had the opportunity to use the May day button when my wife had a problem with a game she purchased on her kindle (she made me buy her an HDX after she saw mine), anyway she purchased a game for the grandchildren to play but it failed to show up in our library so she pressed the May day button. A representative came on well within the 15 second goal. After about a minute n Ute of discussing the problem the internet at my house flickered off for just a minute and cut us off. What then happened next is why I am an absolutely loyal customer. Before I could even get my Kindle reconnected my phone rang and it was another rep calling to finish helping with my problem and then when the device finished reconnecting the original rep came back on the device to also help me. Needless to say we got the situation solved to my complete satisfaction, amazing customer  service. One other feature that we really like is the ability to download movies from Amazon Prime and take them with us when we travel to our house in the mountains. I really can't say enough about this device, there are many more features I could praise but I think you get the point I LOVE MY KINDLE HDX.

Reviews.Title: Terrific Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: robeliot
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HDX is awesome (so far). I've been using mine for a little over a week. It is a great replacement for my old Kindle Fire. I've read in the Kindle Forum that some people have had a problem with 'blue fringe' on the screen edges.  I noticed it when I first started using it but I don't notice it anymore unless I specifically look for it. Typically I read books with black background and white text. I have an iPad 3 with Retina display, too, that I am also happy with but for reading I definitely prefer the Kindle.Pros:01. It is very light and thin.02. Awesome display. The display is very crisp. It's very easy to read books, magazines and movies look as good as they do on my HD TV.03. The home page and Carousel are much improved. The home page area below the Carousel took a little getting used to but I like it now.04. The new options in the App Store, Book Store, Music Store, etc.05. Much easier to add items, such as books or apps, to wish lists.06. Silk Browser. Didn't like it on my old Kindle Fire but it's much improved on the Fire HDX, imho.07. I like the book recommendations displayed under the books in the Carousel. They aren't obtrusive.08. The new Shop tab.09. The (new) native calendar app.10. The improved native email and contacts apps which can be synched with my Google account.11. Mayday! I've used it a couple of times and it is easy and convenient.12. The physical volume rocker control.13. The charging port is much tighter than on my previous Kindle Fire.14. Being able to display the battery percentage with out an app.15. The camera is pretty cool. Don't see myself using it much, if at all, but it's cool that it's there.Cons:01. Even with a cover it is sometimes difficult to hold for long periods of time. I have arthritis in both hands so that may only be a problem for me.02. It is occasionally glitchy. I've had to do a hard reboot a couple of times. Hopefully today's update will take care of that.03. The Amazon App store. I realize this isn't a 'con' of the Kindle Fire HDX but wanted to add that in my review. The Google Play Store (for my phone) and ITunes (for my iPad) have much more to offer.If I think of, or encounter, any other cons I will add them to my review.My Kindle received the latest update today and it added some cool upgrades. The new lock screen is nicer now that it displays the number of unread emails, battery percentage, date and time and new wallpaper. The GoodReads integration is really useful and the ability to create Collections....at last! Smart look up is cool...not earth shattering cool but cool nonetheless. The alarm is nice although I don't know that I'll use it. Second screen is a nice function (assuming it works) but I don't have a Samsung TV or PS3. The print function is a really cool, convenient function although as of yet it doesn't work with my Canon printer. The Canon app is crap. 1 Tap Archive might not be something that I'll use but I suppose it could be useful. The Amazon Cloud Drive is very, very useful. It's an easy, convenient way to move photos and documents from computer to Kindle and mobile phone to Kindle.I received the original Kindle as a Christmas gift one year and the original Kindle Fire as a Christmas gift the following year and was very happy with both of them. The HDX I bought for myself and as you can tell from my review I'm happy with it, too. On average I read one or two books a week and enjoy the convenience of Kindle readers.

Reviews.Title: office elements and printing are a welcome and needed perk.
Reviews.Author: scottkwimer
Reviews.Content: Fast,simple,music sounds amazing. Printing and creating documents and pdf files is a real plus. Smooth operating. Love it. Oh...can read books too!

Reviews.Title: Most satisfying purchase to date. I'm addicted.
Reviews.Author: Ashagail
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at the quality and the functionality of such a small device. I built my computer by hand about a year ago spending almost a grand in parts and my kindle surpasses it in every way. The video is spectacular, sound is so great that it pulsates through the small speakers on the back and the WiFi is much more reliable than my android.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet, might not be the cheapest out there, but worth the price.
Reviews.Author: DMEDelivered
Reviews.Content: So far I really enjoy the tablet.  It's battery life is not as long as I had hoped, but it is still adequate.  The advertisements option is not bad at all, I've actually accepted a few of the offers.  As Christmas rolls around there are a lot of tablets on sale.  That said, I'm still leaning towards the Kindle being worth a bit more as it does seamlessly connect with amazon while also functioning well as an adroid tablet.  Also, Reading kindle docs on here is much better than I expected. The reading mode or screen just makes it pop.  I thought I would have to get a paperwhite if I really wanted a reader, but this more than meets my expectations.  I would definitely look at another or suggest it to a friend who wants a tablet that does exactly what it says it does.  Also, the camera specs don't do it justice.  The pictures are turning out better than you would think based on the spec.  The more I write this, the more I realize it has exceeded my expectations and maybe I should have given it a 5!

Reviews.Title: Except for a "restart" problem - It's great!
Reviews.Author: Leamm
Reviews.Content: For the most part I am totally thrilled with the new Kindle HDX. I love watching videos and reading books. I would give it 5 stars except that I have had it "restart" all on its own while reading. Very odd, no idea why. Not a big deal as it "boots" right back up on its own and I'm right where I was before it shut down. Hope this happens only occassionally, but so far three times since I got it.

Reviews.Title: Love the thing!
Reviews.Author: J. Paisley
Reviews.Content: I ended up buying a second one because my wife and I enjoyed it so much.  I really had to go looking for the "blue screen" edge I have seen complained about and it is absolutely a non-issue for me and completely un-noticed when I am using the device.it is solid technology at a great price.  Use it for reading, photo showing, netflix, pandora, email, games, amazon videos, accessing my sky drive office documents with an app ect.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Marco from Brazil
Reviews.Content: very good product I bougt an apple mini retina and altought the apple mini retina works perfectly and smoother than the kindle , I probably prefer the Kindle because the screen is awsome, less expensive and is closer with a pc operation , I can use apps from oputside amazon app store which is very good but limited sometimes.I bought the 64gigs that is much less expensive than Ipad mini and in my opinion a great a value for your money.

Reviews.Title: Glad I waited until I get get this upgrade
Reviews.Author: nopics_please
Reviews.Content: so far I'm very pleased!  I am finding the Amazon community very helpful with their reviews of applications, etc.  I still have a lot to learn though.  Have yet to be able to access the little 24 hour help person but it's easy to find answers online, too.Still haven't found the Oxford dictionary that is supposed to upload, and I don't know what the Personal Note thing is . . . but everyone needs a project.  I can easily see this little tablet becoming as much a part of me as the old Rolodex or Filofax things did back in my younger days.  IT can hold your life while providing some really great entertainment.

Reviews.Title: Loving it.
Reviews.Author: William D. Tipton
Reviews.Content: Loving it.Got the HDX 7"...one for me and one for the wife.Absolutely no complaints. The mayday feature is great for new users like us when we cant figure something out.Seems to work better on the internet thru the wifi than our hardwired PC's do...faster for certain and sometimes I can  get pages that my PC is having trouble with, go figure.The only shortcoming I have seen is no flash player. So some websites with videos cant play the videos. Not a terrible issue but there are a lot of sites that use flash players. Something to keep in mind if youre shopping around for a tablet.Also I guess the HD models could hook up to a TV with a HDMI cable. The HDX apparently only works wireless. Again, not a huge deal but also something to bear in mind if youre in the market.5 stars for what it is. I use it a lot more than I use my desktop now.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is exactly what I wanted plus
Reviews.Author: jndcarl
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire to upgrade from my Kindle Touch.  It was exactly what I wanted with the added benefits of being able to check my email and use it as a personal planner.  And I can go to the Goodreads website, and Pinterest, and, and, and....I wanted to upgrade because with the Kindle Touch I couldn't read a magazine (The Ensign).  Using the LDS Library App I was able to download magazines, manuals, and scriptures.Then I couldn't get a book from the library for the Kindle, only ePub.  I went to the Kindle forum, someone told me about Overdrive (which is what I use for the audio books) and I downloaded the Kindle Fire version and signed up for Adobe and viola, I can now read the book on my Kindle Fire.  It is exactly what I wanted.I've had it for a couple weeks and I've had no problems.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Carlos Perez
Reviews.Content: Really great tablet.  very nice apps, the resolution and sound is great.  Very easy to use and the apps specially for kids are great.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: My Kindle Fire is easy to use for  the most part.  I'm still having challenges in going to the home page while I'm reading books.  Other than that it's a wonderful note book.

Reviews.Title: A night-and-day difference from Kindle Fire (Gen 1).
Reviews.Author: Arnold Castro "Arnold"
Reviews.Content: A night-and-day difference from Kindle Fire (Gen 1). I loved my 1st Gen Kindle Fire, but it needed some fine tuning (especially on the browser area). On the new HDX, the browsing is perfect, and the screen resolution is astounding. Of course, the integration with Amazon services is exactly what you would expect (nothing new there)! On a final note, I tend not to compare Amazon to the "fruit people" because the purpose on the devices is very different, but this time around Amazon is coming out on top, at an unbeatable price! Booyah!

Reviews.Title: Amazing tablet, Unbelieable Value
Reviews.Author: vic
Reviews.Content: Fast, light to hold, exceptional display.....an upgrade for my wife's older Kindle.  It's a Christmas present and I wanted it ready for her as soon as she opened it for Christmas.  It only took a couple of minutes to unbox, turn it on and download her libraries from the cloud.

Reviews.Title: Tiny Travel Idea
Reviews.Author: vicki  agro
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot and at times I just take this along!  Email, Internet and books...what more does a girl need working on the road!

Reviews.Title: Mostly excellent device
Reviews.Author: nohrboy
Reviews.Content: The display is beautiful, bright and color accurate.It is more than fast enough for my use. Scrolling is smooth and mostly jitter free.I subtracted one star because many of the apps I want are only on google play and you can't load them, at least I couldn't figure out how.

Reviews.Title: Eventually this will be a great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've owned a Kindle Fire, Paperwhite, Keyboard, Fire HD and now 2 different HDX's.  The 2 HDX's are the only Kindle products I've ever had to return. This has the potential to be a great tablet once the bugs are worked out.  The bugs consist mainly of dropped wifi connections, the tablet showing a pop up message that you're not connected to a network when the notification icon shows fully connected, and completely "forgetting" wifi networks on a regular (almost daily) basis.  The first one was "buggy" out of the box, and I had to do 2 factory resets before it would even connect to a wifi network and allow me to register.  I tried factory resets numerous times on the first one and finally returned it.  I then purchased another one and it functioned out of the box, but the wifi issues started within 24 hours.  I did a couple of factory resets and the issues persisted along with random restarts.  After researching the issue online, it appears to be common.  I contacted customer service...who are always fantastic simply to ask if they planned a software or hardware "fix" for these issues.  They offered to exchange the tablet.  In my experience, Amazon is always very quick to fix any software issues...but not so much for hardware.  The solution always appears to be to stand behind the hardware and exchange it if justified.  I've had fantastic experiences with their customer service department.  But then again we buy the majority of our groceries, toiletries, household items and gifts from them...so it's obvious we're very loyal customers.  But in this case after having the same issue with 2 units purchased 3 weeks apart, I opted to simply return the HDX and wait for future "fixes" or for my HD to break beyond repair.  My Fire HD still works great, and I don't need to spend $250 on a table with "OK" improvements that is buggy,  I read and watch movies.  The screen on the HDX is bettter than the HD, but the speakers aren't quite as good.  It's certainly lighter and detaches from the cover easier, but the Origami cover isn't true to the original.  The original "origami" cover would allow you to position the Fire in at least 3 positions including a slanted keyboard setting...the new one only does vertical and horizontal.  We use the video out on the Kindle HD a lot while travelling so the kids can watch "safe" shows in hotels rather than risking the exposure to ^%&$ on hotel cable.  The HDX can employ a wireless device, but it has no mini HDMI out like the HD.  While the volume buttons on the HD were poorly positioned, at least you could reach them while holding the unit in it's case.  When using the Origami case with the HDX the buttons are covered.  So the HDX is faster, lighter, smaller, better screen, better UI, worse speakers, worse connectivity and buggy.  The HD is slightly heavier and larger, fantastic screen but not as good as the HDX.  But it's a 7" screen...I'm still trying to figure out why anyone needs that high of resolution on a 7" screen...but people want it on a 4.7" phone so...  The HD has better speakers and connectivity.  For those interested, the HD can also be "rooted" without losing the Kindle UI or access to Prime instant video features.  As of the time of this review, "rooting" HDX has presented issues for those that don't REALLY know what their doing.  Of course I would never recommend doing this either way since it voids the warranty, but at least there are ways to get that other "store" on the HD without losing all the great Amazon features.  I would have liked the 8.9 tablet, but I think it is way too expensive when you can pick up a Nook HD+ for about 1/3 of the price.  It has the "other" lay store and is easily adapted via the SD card slot to access the Amazon app store.  Of course there's a reason it's priced that low...talk about a "fire" sale!  :)

Reviews.Title: Software issues
Reviews.Author: Sarah Nickels
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 Kindle Fire HDX's as Christmas gifts for my 11yr old and 9yr old. One works great but the other had issues from the start. Kept randomly powering off (among other things)! And now it won't turn on even after troubleshooting. Very Frustrating when you've had it for less than 2 weeks. Spoke to an Amazon Customer Care Rep and they said it's a software issue. Said that they'll send out a new one. Overall we liked the Kindle Fire (when it worked) and Amazon did do a good job at resolving my issue promptly with little hassle.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely WONDERFUL
Reviews.Author: Faith J. Hinkey
Reviews.Content: I'm so happy to have this tablet. I have wanted one for quite a while but was unsure which tablet would be the right one for me. After checking them out on the web I saw this one and decided it would be the one to meet my needs and desires. My husband wanted me to have it for a Christmas present. It exceeds my expectations. So glad I chose this tablet!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have used the Ipad 1,2,3,4,and air and of all the tablets I have used this by far has the best resolution. It's fast and the battery last very  long.

Reviews.Title: Another must have eReader for my collection
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I really like the text-to-speech function.  It has much improved from the very robotic voice on my Kindle Keyboard.  Though not as good as an audible performance, it is great when the eyes are tired or if I need a little help concentrating on the story.  This has replaced my new Paperwhite 2 as my preferred reader.The Prime video streaming is also very good.  Maybe it is the smaller size, but streaming "Duck Dynasty" from Amazon Prime was much clearer and sharper than steaming Netflix on my iPad air.  The subtitles were also available on Amazon and not on Netflix on this particular show.  I haven't compared other videos yet.My only complaint is the blue light bleed when reading a book.  My white pages have a blue edge with one side almost bleeding into the text.  It was a little annoying at first, but the quality text-to-speech makes up for it.  I guess for me, it means if the next 7" HDX uses white instead of blue LED's I'll have to get it as I really love this small lightweight form and the elimination of the blue edge would make it perfect.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied!
Reviews.Author: vinry "yaa"
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Fire HDX 7". I was originally thinking about purchasing the newly released iPad mini Retina display for its smaller screen size, having previously owned the original iPad, then iPad 2 (as well as BlackBerry PlayBook). But then one day I received a 30-day free trial offer for a Kindle Fire HDX from Amazon, and I said to myself "why not" and opted for the 8.9-inch version with the thought that I would just play with it for a couple of weeks and then return it and buy the iPad mini, never suspecting that I would fall in love with the graphics, sound, and ease of use of a Kindle Fire HDX. I still returned the free-trial 8.9-inch one but decided to purchase the 7-inch version, because the former was still a bit too large for my need (recall I have the bigger iPad and iPad2).The 8.9-inch version of this Kindle (the one that I free-tried) doesn't have the bluish borders, the 7-inch version does. I read about this issue while waiting for the delivery my 7-inch version while still using the 8.9-inch version and became concerned. But guess what, it turns out that the borders do not bother me at all. No big deal! I can read each of my e-books just fine. It actually reminds me of the old novels I have whose pages have turned yellowish on the edges.I have a couple of large wide-screen TVs at home but found myself lately watching movies more often on my Kindle Fire HDX. it just shows how good the display of this little device is.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Tessa
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HD X. I love this it is the nicest picture I have seen on any device other than my  HD tv. I lov ewatching TV on this and  browsing. This is the nicest tablet I have ever had! The price is great! I am so glad I chose this. Great Christmas present for anyone out there !

Reviews.Title: In Love
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use and if I don't understand something I just hit the "may day" button. I have an Ipad and I haven't picked it up since I received my Kindle. I am in LOVE with my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: great tablet for school and for fun
Reviews.Author: mitch
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best tablet you could get for your money. From not even considering this tablet in the beginning of my tablet hunt, to owning it now, I am so glad I bought it. I originally was looking for a tablet for school, so.I was looking more at Windows tablets. There's a lot of nice Windows tablets out there, but anything in my price range (200-400) had problems, if it was a high res screen and crappy processor, or a speedy prossesor and a cruddy screen resolution, or even if the item was out of stock or a bad operating system, I had never considered the kindle fire HDX. This runs a 2.2 gigahertz processor about .4-1 gigahertz faster than any Windows tablets I had considered, even the galaxy tablets I was thinking about only had 1.6 gigahertz processors. Galaxy tablets and galaxy notes have maybe 2 things that beat this tablet: the infrared capability and the multitasking capability. Nothing else. The  os on the kindle is just as good, the screen res is 1080 compared.to there 720, camera isn't as good on the kindle but I wasn't concerned about this as I have a nice camera on my phone,and  the processor on the kindle blows the galaxy tablets out of the water! The kindle has just as good productivity capability as the galaxy tablets, because if you buy a stylus and download a note taking app, you have the main selling point of the galaxy note! I think this tablet should be something for everyone to consider

Reviews.Title: Love my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Giselle
Reviews.Content: i love my new kindle. the best feature is the mayday feature is the best. You can instantly get live help if you are new to kindle and don't know how to use it.  AMazon has the BEST customer service i have ever come accross.  I couldn't decide between and ipad mini or a kindle Fire HDX and I am very glad i chose the kindle.

Reviews.Title: In love
Reviews.Author: Reader
Reviews.Content: I had some hesitation about buying this device after reading some of the negative reviews - and the fact that that I was an early buyer of the original Kindle Fire two years ago, which was, to put it mildly, a piece of crap.  I also am a longtime iPad user (and lover) but the iPad is a little hard to hold in one hand when I'm reading in bed.  So I had high hopes that the HDX would fit the bill as a nice, lighter-weight 7-inch device with iPad-like qualities.  I have to say, it really surpassed my expectations!  The display is gorgeous and the Silk browser is about a million light-years away from the original Fire.  The size and weight are perfect (don't underestimate the importance of the lighter weight if you're considering an iPad).  I've had no issues whatsoever with a flickering screen, WiFi connectivity etc that other users mentioned...my experience has been fantastic.As an Apple aficionado, I would still give my iPad a slight edge over the Fire, but only because of the availability of apps and the seamless syncing of all my stuff through iTunes with my iPhone and my Mac desktop.  But aside from those things I actually prefer the HDX purely as a device - the light weight and portability combined with the performance are all amazing.  And at this price point (I actually got the $50 off deal, for $179), it's a no brainer.  Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: lrc3395
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kindle fire HDX to replace an Acer tablet I got last year. Prior to the Acer I had owned a first generation Kindle Fire and a first Generation iPad. The Acer had a four core processor, like the Kindle Fire HDX, was HD, and had a 10.1" screen. The HDX beats the more expensive Acer hands down in every way. The screen is beautiful, with awesome color and clarity, the processor is fast, and the battery life is very good. The sound from the stereo speakers is better than any of the previous tablets I've had, with great separation. The smaller size took a bit to get used to, although I've found I like the portability and light weight of the smaller device.Amazon's operating system works well, and is fairly intuitive, although I had trouble getting some apps to show me the "home" button a few times and I sometimes wish it had a physical sleep button. The "special offers" feature that keeps the price low is very unobtrusive and hasn't bothered me at all. It's definitely not worth the extra expense to upgrade to the version without special offers.I use Amazon products constantly: frequent purchases from their website, the app store, kindle books, Audible, music, and videos. The Kindle Fire HDX seamlessly merges all of those into a convenient package. This is definitely the best tablet available for the money, hands down.

Reviews.Title: Why haven't you gotten one yet??
Reviews.Author: Patricia M. Dashiell
Reviews.Content: I actually have the iPad Mini Retina and this Kindle Fire blows the mini Retina out of the water as far as clarity.  Honestly, I use the mini for all the apps I used to have on my old iPod touch. If you are a Prime member or a streamer, I believe the Kindle Fire is a must.

Reviews.Title: tablet is full of surprises.
Reviews.Author: nathan
Reviews.Content: This tablet is pretty amazing. The size is comfortable enough to hold, type, and surf the internet. The picture quality of the screen is better then my hd tv seems to be. The audio of this tablet though took me by surprise for the speakers being in the back of the tablet the sound quality is absolutely amazing. Sounds like surround sound even. The only reason I didn't give five stars is the fact that a lot of Google apps are not available on this tablet. I use Google chrome as my browser on everything but cannot on here kinda sucks. Hope one day Google and Amazon will join together to share apps.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: This came as a gift to upgrade me from the third generation Kindle and the Kindle app on my smartphone. When given the choice between this and the Paperwhite, I chose this one due to the ability to use as a regular tablet when I'm not reading.Pros:- The picture is absolutely stunning, especially when watching tv/movies. The picture is vibrant, clear, and sharp.- It's faster than I thought it would be, including powering up and down. Much better than the third gen Kindles.- I'm able to play games like Candy Crush Saga and Wheel of Fortune without any issues.- Can access Netflix, Hulu +, and other tv apps!Cons:-The battery doesn't last as long as I had hoped when playing games but it's still better than playing them on my tiny smartphone.- The weight of the Kindle, while lighter than previous generations can feel heavy after using it for a while. This isn't a huge "con" since there are those tablet pillows I can buy to alleviate the need for me to hold it while I watch shows or read.- Every now and then, especially when the brightness is turned all the way up, the screen vibrates which can cause dizziness. It only lasts for a moment at a time but it can get annoying when it does it more than once an hour. When I have the screen dimmed it doesn't appear to have that vibration problem.Overall, this is a fabulous buy, especially for those of us who were able to get a holiday deal on it. Even full price, it's worth it. The Nook was looking good simply because it has access to Google Play and Chrome whereas the Kindle only uses their own proprietary shop (Amazon App Store). But after reading reviews from experts and consumers it seems the Kindle is still the better tablet. Besides, the way Barnes and Noble is heading, they may not be around long enough to support the new Nooks into the future. At least Amazon seems strong and doesn't appear to be going anywhere anytime soon so the Kindle will be supported for years to come.I highly recommend this for anyone older than 10 years old. Even with the parent controls on the Kindle, I would still choose Nabi and Nabi, Jr for kids under the age of 10.

Reviews.Title: For the Novice in all of us...or the non-technigeeks  :)
Reviews.Author: K. Johanson
Reviews.Content: It's not always about saving money, even though the HDX is very, very competitively priced.  Sure, the Kindle family is geared to take advantage of the Amazon media content, but this tablet can do so much more.If you want to search the internet, hit your favorite web sites, or simply cruise web links or other hits, the HDX performs exceptionally well as long as you have an adequate internet connection.  The HDX is perfect for streaming movies and music whether it's Amazon content, or non-Amazon content such as Pandora, Netfilx, or other Kindle and/or Android aps.  The 7" is perfect for my travel needs--it's light enough to hold in one hand, the battery will easily last one day with very heavy use, and it's easy on the eyes as the screen/display is excellent.If you want portability and your needs are primarily email functions, browsing the internet, streaming media, using aps & playing games the HDX is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Kindle's rock, and this one is even better than the last!
Reviews.Author: MM
Reviews.Content: We love our Kindles more than our iPads! The typing is better, the internet is easier to use, and the selection and store is way better. We do use iPads for games, but we might not keep following Apple. It's so much nicer to have an Android platform for multi-tasking apps, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for my mom
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle (so I don't have others to compare it to) but I love it. It is actually a gift for my mom but I had to set it up for her so I actually got to use it for awhile. It is very user friendly and easy to use. I wish you could "jazz" it up a little by changing the background picture or colors on it but you can't. My mom just uses it for games, internet, videos, but hasn't got into any books just yet. Amazon Prime account is a must with this I would think.

Reviews.Title: Runs very fast, great package!
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Pretty slick little system. I'm not in love with the design. The back is not flat, part of it sticks out in a weird pattern but this is way faster than even my Kindle Fire. Having some problems with my Wi-Fi staying connected 1 but my wife's works great. Probably isolated issue. I'd say this is an iPad killer for sure.

Reviews.Title: Patient and Gentle
Reviews.Author: Edith C McDaniel
Reviews.Content: Because they were so helpful and patient with explaining things to me.  I am a senior citizen and I felt like they respected that.

Reviews.Title: In Love with HDX
Reviews.Author: J. Allen
Reviews.Content: As everyone in my family reads we started with just the Kindle Paperwhite.  My girls still use theirs to read daily.  Last year I upgraded to the Kindle Fire and fell in love, was very rarely seen without my Fire.  When my husband decided that he wanted a Fire we debated what we were going to do and decided that I would upgrade and he would take my old Fire.  I bought the HDX from Best Buy and so far I am thrilled with it.  I have not noticed the purple/blue light at the edge that some people have mentioned and find the clarity on the screen to be stunning.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone...Buy and enjoy!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" is an exceptional device.
Reviews.Author: Christopher J. Cowen
Reviews.Content: This device is amazing and you will be happy you bought it. The Kindle Fire is an amazing device that displays images like as if they were lifelike.  The device features a fast 2.2GHz quad-core processor and 2GB of RAM for fast that run apps, games, and videos smoothly without an issues.  You will love this device and you can get free two day shipping with this offer.  So if you are in the market for a tablet you like this Kindle.  The marketplace from Amazon is great too.  There are thousands of books and games for free available to you.The thing that separates Amazon's Kindle devices is the fact that their customer service is world class. So many companies get this aspect of their businesses wrong but not Amazon. I had a Kindle device that died on me and they replaced it no questions asked. I have also had to call them occasionally and believe it or not I actually talked to a person, no recorded message. Amazon gets it when it come to their customer service.You will not regret getting this device.Thank you for reading my review, if you have any questions feel free to email me, I would be happy to help you with any questions you have.

Reviews.Title: Love My First Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tamara
Reviews.Content: Love it. My first experience with tablet. Owned for less than a month therefore still have not checked out all of the loaded applications, books or movies available on this device, have spent much of my time enjoying card and bingo games. I like being able to sync email and use the internet but still need to learn more about how to navigate typing on the keyboard. My laptop is now gathering dust! Yes I have recommended the Kindle Fire HDX to others.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx 7"
Reviews.Author: Tammy Shaffer
Reviews.Content: Everything I was looking for in a tablet, Blue light is very visible on one side! Occasionally shuts off when I am in the middle of something. Fast, very fast. Great for movies, audio books, music, and apps galore. They didn't joke when they set this baby up for the internet. My computer can only wish!  Have origami case, works well, no issues.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Runner
Reviews.Content: Bought this for the wife as a replacement for her old Kindle. She absolutely loves it. She doesn't need to use her laptop much anymore. It looks great too.

Reviews.Title: For simply an entertainment device this is fantastic
Reviews.Author: T. Smith
Reviews.Content: I ended up returning but if you're looking for simply an entertainment device this is fantastic.  And the sound!  Just awesome!But I couldn't live without access to the Google Play store and the lack of a physical home button was a bit of a nuisance.  I kept hitting the virtual button during normal typing... changed it for a Nook HD+, which was a fantastic bargain for only $139 at the time.

Reviews.Title: Fire 7HDX
